name: Islands All the Way Down
description:
Made for The Indie Games Lab Jam #4

The islands are being invaded by monsters, and it is your mission to help slow them down. Select a group of four brave fighters, and do battle against the hordes. But it doesn't stop - your reward for clearing one island is a fresh battleground of foes. How far can you go before you are defeated?

Your fighters:

Archer
Barbarian
Dwarf
Guardian
Monk
Wizard

Enemies:

Lizard
Moose
Rhino
Sensei
Troll

Left-click to select a unit, right click to move or attack.
HP = Health
AT = Attack
DF = Defense
MV = Movement points (1 per tile moved, all remaining to attack)
RG = Range (in tiles)

Assets:

Kenney Vleugels
0x72

SFX:

Kenney Vleugels
Construct 2 Premium Asset Pack

Music:

Corruption by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3555-corruption
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Known bugs:

Horribly balanced
Hitting "End Turn" can produce strange results. The AI I wrote is really weird at times.
